jei.tooltip.not.enough.space: 畫面空間不足，無法顯示JEI介面。
jei.tooltip.ingredient.list.disabled: JEI 物品列表疊層已停用
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.usage.nokey: Add a key binding for JEI bookmarks in your Controls settings.
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.usage.key: Hover over an ingredient and press "%s" to bookmark it.
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.not.enough.space: 這裡沒有足夠的空間來顯示書籤。
jei.tooltip.error.recipe.transfer.no.ser: The server must have JEI installed
jei.tooltip.error.recipe.transfer.disabl: The server config has disabled JEI recipe transfer
jei.tooltip.error.recipe.transfer.too.la: Recipe is too large to craft in the 2x2 player crafting grid.
jei.chat.error.command.too.long: 此指令對Minecraft來說太長了，必須在伺服器上安裝JEI才能處理
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.1: You do not have permission to use JEI's Cheat Mode.
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.disab: On this server, JEI's Cheat Mode is disabled for all players.
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.enabl: On this server, the following types of players can use JEI's Cheat Mode:
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.creat: players who are in Creative Mode
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.op: players who are have Operator Status (/op)
config.jei.title: %MODNAME Config
config.jei.mode.comment: Change the mode that JEI is operating in.
config.jei.mode.cheatItemsEnabled.commen: Give items instead of showing the recipe.
config.jei.mode.editEnabled.comment: 在列表中點擊物品以隱藏或取消隱藏。
config.jei.interface.comment: 使用者介面的相關設定。
config.jei.interface.overlayEnabled.comm: 在打開的GUI一側顯示物品列表。
config.jei.interface.bookmarkOverlayEnab: 在打開的GUI一側顯示書籤列表。
config.jei.search.modNameSearchMode.comm: 當按模組名稱搜尋時，要求使用「@」作為前綴
config.jei.search.tooltipSearchMode.comm: 當按提示搜尋時，要求使用「#」作為前綴
config.jei.search.tagSearchMode.comment: 當按標籤名稱搜尋時，要求使用「$」作為前綴
當按創造模式標籤頁名搜尋時，要求使用「%」作為前綴
config.jei.search.colorSearchMode.commen: 當按物品顏色搜尋時，要求使用「^」作為前綴
config.jei.search.resourceIdSearchMode.c: 當按資源ID搜尋時，要求使用「&」作為前綴
config.jei.advanced.comment: Advanced config options to change the way JEI functions.
config.jei.advanced.itemBlacklist.commen: 黑名單中物品將不會顯示於JEI物品列表。加入格式：modId[:name[:meta]]。使用編輯模式可自動加入或刪除這裡的條目。
config.jei.advanced.colorSearchEnabled.c: 按顏色搜尋物品，並在可以此法搜尋的物品的訊息提示中加以註明。
config.jei.advanced.debugModeEnabled.com: Only useful for JEI developers, adds test ingredients and some debug recipes.
config.jei.advanced.centerSearchBarEnabl: Move the JEI search bar to the bottom center of the screen.
config.jei.advanced.modNameFormat.commen: How the mod name should be formatted in the tooltip for JEI GUIs. Leave blank to disable.
config.jei.advanced.maxColumns.comment: 輸入物品列表的最大寬度。
config.jei.advanced.maxRecipeGuiHeight.c: The maximum height of the recipe GUI.
config.jei.advanced.giveMode.comment: Choose if JEI should give ingredients direct to the inventory (inventory) or pick them up with the mouse (mouse_pickup).
jei.message.configured: 安裝「Configured」模組後可在遊戲內修改設定
description.jei.wooden.door.1: Wooden Doors allow you to block monsters from entering your building.\nTesting sentences.
description.jei.wooden.door.2: Clicking on a door changes its state from open to closed and vice versa.
description.jei.wooden.door.3: 木門可以通過紅石電路打開/關閉。
jei.key.category.hover.config.button: JEI（將滑鼠懸停在配置按鈕上）
key.jei.copy.recipe.id: 複製合成配方ID至剪貼簿
jei.message.copy.recipe.id.success: 已複製配方 ID 到剪貼簿：%s
jei.message.copy.recipe.id.failure: 無法複製配方 ID 到剪貼簿，未知的配方 ID
key.jei.closeRecipeGui: 關閉合成表使用者介面
